__e: Well, I don't have much use for the law, and you don't have much time.
That's what I wanted to hear.
But sometimes even more important than your knowledge of the situation is what you know about the person you are trying to save.
Knowledge that must never be spoken.
The knowledge that one day things will change because they have to.
No one, except God, possesses the power and knowledge of what is to come.
The knowledge of what is, what has been and what is yet to come.
Only with the white man's knowledge... can we keep what little we have left.
Everyone in hell has knowledge of the past and the future, but not of the present.
And I should know because I have the knowledge of good and evil.
The Men of the Machine had a whole contraption for this.
Because I was always afraid that I had so little knowledge of this world.
She still has no knowledge of her father's death.
I want you to know, for the record that nothing happened here tonight.
So what are you going to do with the knowledge you now have about our program?
If we are, that's beyond any personal knowledge I have of the situation.
He had knowledge and the opportunity.

I can't wait to take all this knowledge and experience back to the real world.
But age breeds wisdom, and this I know-- the best is yet to come.
I have spent my life in seeking knowledge. This is all I know.
As someone once said, knowledge is power.
Knowledge is power... (KEYS JANGLE) ..and he knows everything.
For if knowledge is power then a god am I!
Knowledge is power... (KEYS JANGLE) ..and he knows everything.

For if knowledge is power then a god am I!
